name: Bombardier's Rucksack
flavorText: Designed by a watchmaker's apprentice turned demon hunter, this rucksack makes use of its maker's knowledge of clockworks to greatly miniaturize the turret mechanism, allowing its owner to field more of the devices without the case being any more heavy or cumbersome than an ordinary quiver.
flavorTextHtml: Designed by a watchmaker's apprentice turned demon hunter, this rucksack makes use of its maker's knowledge of clockworks to greatly miniaturize the turret mechanism, allowing its owner to field more of the devices without the case being any more heavy or cumbersome than an ordinary quiver.

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Chance Increased by [8.0 - 10.0]%
Increases Sentry Damage by [75 - 100]%

secondary.textHtml: You may have 2 additional Sentries. (Demon Hunter Only)
secondary.text: You may have 2 additional Sentries. (Demon Hunter Only)
